## Including Plots

```{r generating-samples, echo=TRUE}
set.seed(1234)
N = 50000
x <- rnorm(N)
y <- rnorm(N, mean = 1.7, sd = 0.4)
hist(x, col=rgb(0,0,1,1/4))
hist(y, col=rgb(1,0,0,1/4), add=TRUE)
```

```{r, echo=TRUE}
ks.test(x, y)
```


```{r, echo=TRUE}
#ks.test(x, y, alternative = c("two.sided", "less", "greater"), exact = NULL)
ks.test(x, y, alternative="two.sided", exact = NULL)
```
